title: Problem 1- Repeated crash and shut down Problem 2 - C-port not recognizing earphone and pc * Urgent
content: Hi, I am totally not satisfied with my pixel device, as in only 6th month of its use I am experiencing repeated faults , as I have questioned today I have experience  repeated shutdowns and their was also some issues with it's C- port as it don't recognize my earphones as well my PC , I need urgent support , otherwise I have to take suitable action regarding that . Thanks
